## Buckets.init() method

Initializes a new bucket.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
init(name: string, ctx?: ContextInterface): Promise<pb.InitReply.AsObject>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Human-readable bucket name. It is only meant to help identify a bucket in a UI and is not unique. |
|  ctx | ContextInterface | Context object containing web-gRPC headers and settings. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;pb.InitReply.AsObject&gt;
